attributes.action: Wage Cut To All Local & County Councils Chief Executives Pay Every Year !
attributes.additional_details: The Wage Cut To All Local & County Councils Chief Executives Pay Every Year because to find out why they not giving the correct standards services to all UK local residents is paying their full council tax for public services, but not " NO IMPROVEMENTS SHOWN BY THEM AT ALL, instead of cutting local county & council staff jobs instead to save money every year !
